name: Connor Holt
text: Such great pizza! We have eaten here several times in the past couple years that they have been open. The owners are amazing people!

name: Liesl Carlson
text: Loved this pizza! My husband has celiac disease. And he said this is the best gluten free pizza he's ever had! And he's tried many!

name: Cole Finlinson
text: The employees were so kind and helpful. It was very clean in the restaurant and they made sure I had a really good experience. The food is also delicious and there are many great deals here. Will definitely be a regular from now on.

name: ElvaLauj
text: I love their pizza and the deals are great! I always get their mix and match for $5.99 each: a pizza to go with a side salad. There's one time were my salad didn't look as fresh so I give it a 4 star but its almost always fresh! :)

name: Gee Santini
text: Best pizza nation wide! 1st Howie's pie since 2 years in WA, they nailed it. Cajun spice extra pep no cut... $8.60 out the door online

name: Collin Marsaw
text: Love Hungry Howie‚Äôs! Will go here over an other name brand pizza joint, they always have great coupons and the pizza is really, really good. Hope you guys will never let us down like other national brands have!

name: Jarrett Sorensen
text: Not good enough to justify the outrageous prices! This is my first and last time trying this pizza. Domino's pizza has much better garlic crust, and there's no way their large pizza is worth $16! Nothing about it is that good.

name: Bill Cruys
text: Excellent service delight was great puzza was very good

name: Melissa Watt
text: By far best pizza and sub place on earth!! I'm soooo incredibly sad they closed here in Boise! I could drive the 5 hours just to eat there!

name: Trent Stokes
text: I haven't tried their pizza, but I do love their sandwiches. They are more like a calzone. My favorite is their chicken, bacon, ranch sandwich, but they have all been really good. I didn't give 5 stars because it is a little pricey. Tuesday is the best day to buy because on the small sizes, you get 2 for 1.

name: Annie Prescott
text: Cheap good pizza, lots of deals, and super friendly staff

name: Rachel M
text: I adore the way they make the Hawaiian Pizzas. These pizzas are amazing and I love the different crust seasonings. Last time I went my pizza got mixed up which has never happened to me before but they went above and beyond by refunding my ‚Ä¶More

name: Marian Fielding
text:
The pizza is good and the staff friendly
But I feel like the price is quite high for what you get and that was even with a coupon. The flavored crusts are tasty. I'll go back to try their subs next time.

name: Hailey Richards
text: Hungry Howie's is my new favorite pizza joint. The crust is what makes me come back for more. LOVE LOVE LOVE

name: Connor Parker
text: I had a great experience here! I came in with a coupon for a 2 topping medium with flavored bread sticks. Chicken as a topping was extra, but they said that I could just have the one topping of chicken for the same price as before which I ‚Ä¶More

name: Harley Rich
text: The service is always top-notch! As is the pizza! So many flavorful options and I have yet to find one I dislike. Great food! Great team! Great Management!

name: Kyesha Fenn
text: Super friendly staff. Love the option to make crusts! Definitely gives your personal pizza its own personal identity. Well made product worth its price.

name: Andrew Orton
text: 2. Hungry Howies -7/10! Chicken bacon ranch pizza. A pleasant surprise! Great texture, crust slapped. Great service and good pizza. Flavorful and satisfying. Pros: carryout. More bang for the buck. Delicious options. Cons: carryout, not a place to eat and vibe. Greasy, may need a shower after.

name: bigblockbowtieguy1
text:
This place was seriously good.
We went in as a group, and just wanted to give Hungry Howie's a try.
I'm really glad we did. The pizza is great.

name: eggfriedlice
text: The food always comes hot and fresh and the employees are great in the store and through delivery. This store offers great specials on their website, hooked app, and mail-in coupons! This place has great food that any crowd can enjoy.

name: Dallas Heaton
text: I quite enjoyed the flavored crusts (I had the butter and then the garlic). The pizza itself was also delicious! Prices seemed reasonable and the service was fast. No complaints and I am looking forward to returning!

name: Stephen Fairbanks
text: Great pizza, good service. When they mess up they fix it.

name: Jeremy Wilkerson
text: We (my family) typically like most of you go to little Caesars for a quick pizza meal.  Which I‚Äôve done for years now.  However one night last week while attempting to order a pizza from little Caesars through the drive through I wasn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶More

name: Gillian Kik
text: Best cheeseless pizza in town if you‚Äôre vegan or have a dairy allergy like I do! Great deals and awesome employees.

name: Laura Adams
text: Employees were kind and helpful, and the store was clean. We both got the chicken and cheese filled dough, and there was about an inch of solid dough on either end of the sandwich. The amount of chicken was disappointing!

name: Dave Ferrin
text: Hungry Howie's and Logan, Utah is great. The folks that work there are super friendly, the pizza is excellent and the cheese bread is to die for !!!

name: Gregory Mullen
text: Would absolutely recommend trying this spot. Great ambience, flavorful dishes, awesome service. Keep up the good work.

name: Shyanne Moffitt Brazell
text: Some of the best pizza I've ever had and it's barely more expensive than little ceasars! Plus their staff are super friendly. I'm obsessed

name: Kaden Mainwood
text: There was this girl working on 3/14 and she was soooo cute made my experience amazing

name: Austin Twede
text: Love this pizza. Flavored crust is delicious. They're my new regular

name: Scott Matson
text: I love pizza in general, but this is great pizza. Great crust, great cheeses, well made. Using the coupon codes makes it even better.

name: Yolanda Dominguez
text: Love Hungry Howie's Pizza!! üçïüçïüçï

name: The McCreas
text: Great Pizza! We were skeptical about the fact that there pizza menu and type was so similar to Little Caesars. But we were wrong to even put them in the same category! ‚Ä¶More

name: Alan H.
text: Good service and great food fast.

name: Brandon Thiriot
text: Really good pizza and bread sticks sides. I am normally not a huge flavored crust guy. I am a devoted pizza hut dude, but Howie's pizza I think surpasses pizza hut sometimes. I felt it was higher quality although it costs a bit more. They ‚Ä¶More

name: Liz Clough
text: I always go out of my way to review places which give me great service. I went to the Logan location.  The process of ordering was easy, they had the pizzas out fast, and the service was refreshing! Great service, great experience, and great pizza. New favorite pizza spot!

name: Jessica Olsen
text: Great crust options, cheese and sauces are really good. My favorites are the cheese bread and the butter crust for pizza. They have great deals and customer service, and this is one of my new favorite pizza places. Highly recommend!

name: Adrian Parkinson
text: Very reasonable prices & friendly, fast efficient service

name: Robert A Auman
text: The lady behind the counter was nice but had some serious troubles answering some easy food questions. The pizza was good little greasy and I got the garlic crust and that was intense.  So sorry but this is a solid 3.

name: Rebecca Teeples
text:
You need to try this place! Delicious crust... lot of options. Great service and prices.
I will definitely be back!

name: Mike Metcalf
text: Wrong hours posted on google

name: Carlos Walcott
text: Had a late night pickup on my way back home to Winnipeg, Canada. I ordered a pepperoni and a chicken bacon ranch. The positive reviews were bang on! My sons who only eat pepperoni pizzas and have had A LOT from various pizza places, ‚Ä¶More

name: Asmodeus 666
text: Gluten free pizza was actually pretty great, customer service was top notch. Not a lot of places do gluten free well, nice to have another place I can take my gluten intolerant wife.

name: Eddie Holloway
text: First time trying Hungry Howie's and it was their first day open. It was AMAZING! And for the price, you can't beat it! The staff was also super good and sweet! My wife and I are believers and we will be back! Fantastic all around!

name: Sarah Roberts
text: yummy pizza for a good price and good location. They often have deals on the Hooked app.

name: Alyssa R
text: So yummy and the guys there are super nice!

name: Thomas Mockler
text: Quick. Cheap. Tasty.

name: Mallory Bybee
text:
Fast, efficient, kind, helpful, fantastic service and food to match!
I'd post a photo but I ate too fast.

name: Djinn Smith
text: Hungry Howie's is by far my favorite place to get pizza

name: Kayden Jensen
text: Really good gluten free pizza!

name: Ryan Egbert
text: Order delivery tonight it came to our home promptly on the time they said and very hot. The Pepsi was also cold which isn't common from pizza stores. Their pizza was good and loved their 3 cheese bread

name: Allison goulais
text: I think 2 stars is being generous. This place is barely on par with Pizza Hut. The food came suspiciously fast... which was even more suspect when it was luke warm. The sauce for came in prepackaged cups. I‚Äôd recommend Little Caesar‚Äôs over this place

name: Sarah Kenison
text: Pizza was pretty good. Better than Little Caesars, not as good as Papa John's/Dominos. For the price, it's a good deal.

name: Jacob Stephenson
text: I ordered some pizza from their app on a timed order. It was ready for pick up exactly when they said it would be, I could tell that the food was fresh and it tasted great! The man who helped us was great too! Keep up the good work, I will definitely be back for more!

name: Kevin Wolters
text: Have always taken my food "to go" when ordering HH, but I love their pizza, cheese sticks & those brownies are to die for!   Normally, a place this good would get four stars, cause that's really freaking good.  Their hours push Hungry Howie's into the five star realm!

name: Relda Sandgran
text: They have a wonderful GF pizza crust.

name: Gage Bickmore
text: Great pizza and bread for a really good price

name: Jason Merrill
text: Purchased 3 different pizzas and all of them tasted fantastic! My kids loved them and love the flavored crusts. The price is the only reason I didn't score it a 5.

name: Devon Johnson
text: The bbq chicken pizza with parmesan and butter garlic crust is one of the best pizzas I have ever eaten! Love this place!

name: J Smillie
text: This place is awesome. The pizza is so yummy and the service and prices are great. Give this place your business, not Lucky Slice.

name: Kristopher Mota
text: Their pizza is Terrible but the 3 cheeser bread is soo good

name: Shelly
text: I would say this place is in between Little Ceasar's and Domino's in taste and quality.

name: Kendall Brown
text: Really good pizza and it didn't cost a lot.

name: Talisa Loosli
text: My husband and I ate here for the first time a few days ago and we absolutely love it!!! Going back again!!

name: Todd Durrant
text: Nice alternative to Little Caesars for about the same price.

name: anna perez
text: Food is good just feel little to pricey

name: Jaxon Nix
text: Ordered pizza from here and not only was it really tasty but it got to me super fast for how far away I live!

name: Michele Estrella
text: Hungry Howie's has amazing pizza. The cheesy bread is my favorite

name: Bob Blue
text: They don't skimp on the toppings and their flavored crust, which can even be made gluten free, was way better than I expected.

name: Terry Dey
text: Best bargain pizza in town definitely better than Little Caesars, and the delivery is a nice option for when you don't want to pick up.

name: Haley Whiteman
text: The pizza and chessy bread was amazing for takeout pizza! I'll definitely be going back. Great coupons too. üëçüëç

name: Jared Fulgham
text: Really liked our visit here. Getting asiago chess on the crust of the chicken bacon ranch was suggest by the cashier and was a spot on choice!

name: suman paudel
text: Just had a pizza from here along with their signature bread it is sooooo yummy..not only that but also the customer service is amazing I wasn't able to know the guy's name who took our order he is so friendly and helpful. Highly recommended üòãüòã

name: Bryan Oliver
text: Service kinda slow but pizzamakes up for it.

name: drew nielson
text: Pretty good food

name: Laura Weaver
text: We just spent like 30 minutes on the phone ordering a pizza because we're indecisive and they were so nice to us and so patient. They delivered the yummiest pizza and breadsticks ever üòçüòçüòç

name: Melanie Evans
text: Awesome pizza!  Great customer service!   Love the wings, subs and breadsticks as well!

name: Maura Yireh Rios
text: I love Hungry Howies! Use to eat all the time in Florida. So happy they made it to Logan, UT.

name: Jacob Bellucci
text: Used a Hooked deal and it was quick, good, and cheap!

name: Carson Schwope
text: Amazing service, great staff!

name: Nikki Kent
text: My son had the chicken wings last night and I'm pretty certain it gave him food poisoning.  Maybe undercooked?  He is now throwing up and oh look... chicken!  Not cool!

name: Michelle Parrish
text: Love the stuffed crust! Their cheese bread is also amazing!!

name: Adam Davidsavor
text: I loved it, putting spices on the crust somehow does it for me.

name: Andrew Schiebergen
text: Haven't eaten here since I lived back east. Wasnt disappointed.

name: John m Mermigas
text: Great Staff awesome food 10/10 recommend

name: Kevin Anderson
text: Great Pizza, excellent service and a friendly staff!

name: Sean Stewart
text: Don't Be Put off By the Amateurish Branding, This is Our New Favorite Pizza Place. My wife and I tried this place and have ordered pizza from here twice again in the past week! It's amazing pizza, especially the Asiago crust. A few other ‚Ä¶More

name: Jaxon Bradford
text: Matthew please stop stalking me.

name: Kyler Figgins
text: Amazing pizza. The asiago cheese crust was my favorite.

name: Brian Hoffmann
text: This pizza is maybe 1% better than Little Cesar's Pizza, but it costs twice as much and made me sick.

name: Max Johnson
text: Delicious pizza

name: Adyson Bell
text: Great pizza awesome customer service.

name: Gregg Hess
text: Best bang for your buck!!

name: Michelle Harker
text: It's great! And they're fast!!!

name: Marci Livermore
text: I loved the cheesey bread! Would get it every time!

name: Nathan Wilson
text: Good pizza.

name: Ian W
text: Flavor crust is gucci

name: Critic 1713
text: One sentence bacon chicken ranch pizza

name: drake segura
text: Dominos is better

name: Vikki Hawkes
text: AMAZING!!!! Best pizza, howie bread, and howie rolls! In Logan‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§

name: Abe Clark
text: Cheesy bread!! Wings are good too!

name: Isaac Anawalt
text: Honestly the worst pizza you can buy in town. I would place it's quality below that of little ceasars, at twice the price.

name: Adam Torrie
text: Very tasty

name: Eric Holbrook
text: It was okay
